title: (x) Carlos Castaneda "The Art of Dreaming" book cover type - FF Oneleigh {Stephen}
content:
Sorry not to have a bigger image - but anybody know what font this is? It's really pretty, and kind of hand-drawn looking (hard to tell from the jpeg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/006092554X_3890.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg)
author: pattyfab

comments.content: [FF Oneleigh](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140010/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_oneleigh_regular/&sample_text=The%20art%20of%20dreaming&sample_size=48) - one of my favorite underused FontFonts.
